title: Earning Your Coins
description: Learn about earning money through work with Captain Coinbeard
npcGreeting: Ahoy there, young adventurer! I'm Captain Coinbeard, and I'll teach you the pirate's way of earning treasure! Every coin must be earned through honest work!
npcFarewell: Well done, matey! You've learned that hard work pays off. Keep earning those coins the right way!

questions.text: What's the best way to earn coins?
questions.explanation: Exactly! Doing chores and helping others is the best way to earn coins. It teaches responsibility and the value of hard work!

choices.text: Asking for money without doing anything

questions.text: You help wash dishes for 5 coins and clean your room for 3 coins. How much did you earn total?
questions.explanation: Perfect! 5 + 3 = 8 coins total. You're becoming quite the hard worker!

questions.text: If you earn 2 coins every day for a week, how many coins will you have?
questions.explanation: Excellent! 2 coins √ó 7 days = 14 coins. Consistency in earning is very important!
